definition: lit. one-track path; fig. to adopt a unified approach to discussing an issue/to sing from the same hymn-sheet
with the same idea in mind/with a common purpose
United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)

sentences.english: We stand for independent management of export and import transactions under unified leadership.
sentences.chinese: 我们主张分头经营，统一领导。

sentences.english: On the palate it is harmonious with a delicious sweetness and well balance acidity.
sentences.chinese: 酒体平衡，美味的甜度和酸度的和谐而统一。

sentences.english: I. To unify your thoughts and always keep in mind the overall situation.
sentences.chinese: 统一思想，牢固树立大局意识。

sentences.english: You want the party to look similar - but not like members of a choir.
sentences.chinese: 你想让婚宴有统一格调却又不像唱诗班。

sentences.english: But the dollar's unity or reunification of the rentier war is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 但是美元统一或食利者的统一战争，是必然出现。

sentences.english: But the dollar's unity or reunification of the rentier war is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 但是美元统一或食利者的统一战争，是必然出现。

sentences.english: Fourth, Northeast anti-Japanese national united front is characterized by its universality.
sentences.chinese: 第四，东北抗日民族统一战线具有广泛性。

sentences.english: An united space datum line has been given.
sentences.chinese: 给出统一的空间基准线。

sentences.english: Qin Shihuang, ancient China's unifier, burned books and buried scholars alive.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇，古代中国的统一者，焚书坑儒。

sentences.english: Maintain and establish standards for the correct practice of Yijin exercise.
sentences.chinese: 建立及维持易筋运动方法的标准和统一化。

sentences.english: Its common name, to you and I, is the nightshade and it is highly poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 对我们来说，它统一的名字是夜影，它也有剧毒。

sentences.english: In the opinion of some lofty experts they never quite cohered again.
sentences.chinese: 在某些玄虚的专家看来，他们没有再完全融洽统一过。

sentences.english: We're all goin' the same way, just taking different roads to get there…
sentences.chinese: 我们都走向统一个方向，只是走的路不同罢了。

sentences.english: Uniform polar response provides natural off-axis response for critical recording.
sentences.chinese: 统一的极性响应提供关键记录的自然离轴响应。

sentences.english: Directness and indirectness form a contradiction, but, on the other hand, they are united into a whole.
sentences.chinese: 直接与间接是矛盾的，同时又是统一的。

sentences.english: The heart of the Aztecs' power was an economic unity.
sentences.chinese: 阿芝科特政权的核心是一个经济统一体。
